title: Popilush Shapewear Dress Mini Slit Built in Shapewear Bra 8 in 1 Square Neck Bodycon Summer Dress for Women 2024
description: 8 IN 1 DESIGN: The uncompressed butt design enhances your curves. Mesh lining sculpts your thighs. Wide shoulder straps prevent rolling. Detachable cups offer versatile wearing options, and the double-layer abdominal design smooths your midsection
COMFORTABLE MODAL FABRIC: The outer slip dress is made of premium quality modal fabric, it is very comfortable and breathable. If you are between 2 sizes, please choose size up for all day comfort

BUILT IN SHAPEWEAR: It is a fitted dress with a built in body shaper. You only need to wear our bodycon dress, which is equivalent to the effect of other people wearing bodysuits under dresses, creating a ideal hourglass figure for you in just a step

INNER MESH SHAPER: The inner shapewear is made with double layer premium quality mesh fabric, stretchy and good moieture absorplion, comfortable enough to wear all day. Overlap crotch design no need to take the whole dress off, easy to pee

FOR ANY OCCASION: Ideal for daily wear, lounge, holiday, beach, wedding guests, evening parties, dating, gala, and other occasions. Also suit for garden picnic, retro tea party, club wearing, show performance and other events
